body:
### Welcome to KG engine website.
KG is an open source 3d game engine.
The engine is in development.
This website is under construction.

### Important!
It is very important to know this project is in a very early stage of development.

### What is KG engine?
KG is an open source 3d game engine intended to be powerful and flexible and still have an easy to use API.
The Engine is game-object component oriented, flexible and designed to be easy and intuitive for developers.
It is plugin based, manager based and will have an intuitive editor.

### Is KG a game engine?
Yes. KG is a 3d game engine. It is inspired from OGRE's power and Irrlicht's easy API, CryEngine's level editor and Unreal Editor's resource management.

### Is it really free?
Yes. The KG engine is under the MIT License.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: KG engine
